definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The exaggerated bosom ornament, big black feathers joss-stick shoulder white dew.
sentences.chinese: 胸前点缀夸张的黑色羽毛，大露雪白香肩。

sentences.english: Snow White was feeling much better and promised she would not talk to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 雪白色正在感觉好多了而且答应她不和任何人说话。

sentences.english: They sit down at a table which is covered with snow-white tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一张桌旁坐下，桌布雪白。

sentences.english: Mary had a little lamb, its fleece was white as snow.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽有只小羊羔，啊缜雪白小羊羔。

sentences.english: His black fur coat was white with snow.
sentences.chinese: 他的黑色裘皮大衣是雪白色。

sentences.english: It was poisoned and Snow White fell to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 它被毒害，而且雪白色落到地板。

sentences.english: You should have a white chest grasping conspicuous finger mark.
sentences.chinese: 你雪白雪白的胸前竟有一抓显眼的指痕。

sentences.english: You should have a white chest grasping conspicuous finger mark.
sentences.chinese: 你雪白雪白的胸前竟有一抓显眼的指痕。

sentences.english: Watts's journey into trend research began, improbably , with the snowy tree cricket.
sentences.chinese: 瓦特研究流行趋势是从雪白树蟋开始的。

sentences.english: Under this tree sat an old woman with long white hair.
sentences.chinese: 在这些树下面，坐着一个雪白长发的老妇人。

sentences.english: Their white, bushy bodies are cute, look like a tiny snowball.
sentences.chinese: 雪白的身体毛茸茸的，缩起来像是一个小雪球。

sentences.english: The trees were full of sweet-smelling, snowy- white flowers.
sentences.chinese: 树上开满了雪白而芬芳的花朵。

sentences.english: He gestured with a long white hand to the empty cups in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 他用纤长雪白的手向我面前的空杯子做了个手势。

sentences.english: Lotus white meat inside is yellow, the middle has a green core.
sentences.chinese: 雪白的莲肉里面是黄色的，中间还有一条绿色的芯。

sentences.english: White dress hanging in that waiting for the slightest hint of gray to deceive sad.
sentences.chinese: 雪白的礼服挂在那等待淡淡的灰朦有一丝悲哀。

sentences.english: She was dressed in rich materials-satins, and lace, and silks-all of white.
sentences.chinese: 她穿的都是贵重料子，绸缎花边一应俱全，全身雪白。
